servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram:For Diesel Engine Model .

entry.ptxt: Communication error between ICM and ECM or battery voltage is lower than specified value

item.ptxt: When ICM detects DTC B1702 although engine has started, battery may be defective. In such case, check battery, referring to Battery Inspection:For Diesel Engine Model . Also, recharge or replace battery if necessary. After that, recheck DTC.

When DTC B1702 and B1709 are detected at the same time, CAN communication circuit may be faulty. Check if DTC related to CAN failure is detected by ECM, BCM, keyless start control module (keyless start model), 4WD control module and/or ABS/ESP® control module. If it is detected, perform applicable DTC diag. flow.

action.ptxt: Go to Immobilizer Control System Check:For Diesel Engine Model .

test1.ptxt: Check ECM for DTC referring to DTC Check:For Diesel Engine Model .
Check ABS control module or ESP® control module for DTC. For ESP® model, refer to DTC Check . For non-ESP® model, refer to DTC Check .
Check BCM for DTC referring to DTC Check .

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

test1.ptxt: Check if any fuse is blown.

testgroup.title: ICM connector check

test1.ptxt: With the ignition key at OFF position, disconnect ICM connector.
Check for proper connection at terminals and wires of connector. Refer to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.question: Is each terminal and wire connection normal?

testgroup.title: ECM connector check

test1.ptxt: With the ignition key at OFF position, disconnect ECM connectors.
Check for proper connection at terminals and wires of ECM connectors. Refer to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.question: Is each terminal and wire connection normal?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check CAN communication circuit between ICM and ECM for open, short and high resistance. Refer to Electrical Circuit Inspection Procedure .

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: ICM power and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check power and ground circuit of ICM referring to Inspection of Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) and Its Circuit:For Diesel Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Is power and ground circuit of ICM normal?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ICM and recheck. If DTC B1702 is still detected, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
